text: Colm Keane (1951 - 22 January 2022) was an Irish author, broadcaster and journalist. He wrote 29 books, including eight No.1 Irish best-sellers. He was born in County Cork, Ireland. In the 1980s, he was hired to work with RTÃ‰ Radio 1. Keane died on 22 January 2022, aged 70. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Irish television presenters Category:Irish novelists Category:Irish journalists Category:People from County Cork
